text: Shang-Fen Ren is a professor emerita at Illinois State University. She was appointed professor at Illinois in 1995, retiring to become professor emerita in 2011. She was awarded the status of Fellow in the American Physical Society, after she was nominated by their Forum on International Physics in 2001, "for her contributions to theoretical understanding of low-dimensional semiconductor systems, especially the vibrational properties in semiconductor superlattices, quantum wires, and quantum dots as well as for her many contributions promoting international physics." == References == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American women physicists Category:Illinois State University faculty Category:Fellows of the American Physical Society Category:American Physical Society
title: Shang-Fen Ren
